art.author: linda_christine_lukehart
art.post: I read this little book in a couple hours, I loved every word..I do believe it is true.  I know Jesus wants everyone to know him and come to the father.  I was so moved by the things the boy remembered.  I am looking forward to seeing Jesus soon.  I too thought the picture would match up with the Shroud, am glad to see others feel the same.Jesus is coming soon, look to Him for your salvation,  He is the only way.  Love to all.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud

art.author: linda_christine_lukehart
art.post: I agree with you, Christ is coming soon.  I pray that everyone will receive Him soon
